channel.title: Comments on: The Backhand In Tennis — Why Is The Backhand Important?
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Michael Robertson
item.dc:creator: Michael Robertson
item.description:
Hi There
First off, I love the website. It's really nicely done and I appreciate the YouTube stylings of many of the front cover pictures. This is a really in depth and great resource for coaches and players alike. So nice job man! Thanks for the site :)
As a coach myself, I think that there just isn't enough in terms of engaging tennis resources on the web. I wanted to ask you a few questions over LinkedIn or something like that but I couldn't find you. If you have time to perhaps answer some questions I have as an admirer and web builder, I'd be very grateful.
Thanks again for the great site! Really useful. Going to implement a few things when this whole Corona thing is over.
Keep well!
Mike
item.content:encoded:
Hi There

First off, I love the website. It’s really nicely done and I appreciate the YouTube stylings of many of the front cover pictures. This is a really in depth and great resource for coaches and players alike. So nice job man! Thanks for the site ðŸ™‚

As a coach myself, I think that there just isn’t enough in terms of engaging tennis resources on the web. I wanted to ask you a few questions over LinkedIn or something like that but I couldn’t find you. If you have time to perhaps answer some questions I have as an admirer and web builder, I’d be very grateful.

Thanks again for the great site! Really useful. Going to implement a few things when this whole Corona thing is over.
